titlePlaceholder: Add a title that describes your video
thumbnailSelectionMessage: Select or upload a picture that shows what's in your video. A good thumbnail stands out and draws viewers' attention
madeForKidsLabel: Is this video made for kids?
madeForKidsLegalRequirement: Regardless of your location, you're legally required to comply with the Children's Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA) and/or other laws. You're required to tell us whether your videos are made for kids.
madeForKidsAdsMessage: Features like personalized ads and notifications won’t be available on videos made for kids. Videos that are set as made for kids by you are more likely to be recommended alongside other kids’ videos.
madeForKidsNo: No, it's not made for kids
ageRestrictionQuestion: Do you want to restrict your video to an adult audience?
ageRestrictionDescription: Age-restricted videos are not shown in certain areas of YouTube. These videos may have limited or no ads monetization.
ageRestrictionYes: Yes, restrict my video to viewers over 18
ageRestrictionNo: No, don't restrict my video to viewers over 18 only
paidPromoDescription: If you accepted anything of value from a third party to make your video, you must let us know. We’ll show viewers a message that tells them your video contains paid promotion.
paidPromoAcknowledgement: My video contains paid promotion like a product placement, sponsorship, or endorsement
paidPromoDisclaimer: By selecting this box, you confirm that the paid promotion follows our ad policies and any applicable laws and regulations.
tagsDescription: Words and phrases used that give context about the video
visibilityDescription: Choose when to publish and who can see your video
privateDescription: Only you and people you can choose can watch your video
unlistedDescription: Anyone with the video link can watch your video
